newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Fluor raised by Opco.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Fluor raised by Opco.

text.p: -- Oppenheimer & Co analyst Douglas Augenthaler said he raised Fluor Corp Wednesday afternoon to buy from outperform
-- Higher view mainly reflects price, with stock trading near low end of range, target is low 80's in 12 months
-- Analyst raised 1996 EPS view to $3.15/shr from $3.10, ups 1997 to $3.65 from $3.50
-- Analyst positive on Fluor's diversified geographical mix in engineering & construction
-- Flour off 1/4 to 61-3/8 in morning trade
